title: Go jump in a lake: Measuring the data lake effect on your SIEM
summary: The article discusses the impact of integrating data lakes with Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) systems. Data lakes offer scalable storage and processing capabilities, allowing organizations to handle vast amounts of structured and unstructured data. title: Palo Alto Networks warns of DoS bug letting hackers disable firewalls
summary: Palo Alto Networks has issued a warning about a newly discovered vulnerability in its firewalls that could allow hackers to launch a Denial of Service (DoS) attack. This bug could enable attackers to disable the firewall systems, leaving networks exposed to further attacks. The company is urging organizations to update their systems promptly with the latest security patches to mitigate potential risks. This vulnerability highlights the importance of regular updates and vigilant security practices to protect against sophisticated cyber threats.
